sourcesContent:
import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import CardGroup from 'react-bootstrap/CardGroup'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { BrowserRouter, Route, Routes, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { loadImages } from './loadImages'; function Home() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { loadProducts(); },[]); const loadProducts = async () => { var username = 'kwame'; var password = 'kwame'; var basicAuth = 'Basic ' + btoa(username + ':' + password); const result = await axios.get("http://localhost:8081/list", {headers:{ 'Authorization': + basicAuth, }, withCredentials:false}) setProducts(result.data); } const navigate = useNavigate(); // const handleClick() { // } return ( Store Front {products.map((item, index) => ( {item.productName} Description: {item.productDescription} Price: £{item.productPrice} Category: {item.productCategory} Quantity: {item.productQuantity} ))}

{/* Tote Bag Description: Tote Bag for your grocery shopping Price: £5.00 Cateory: Accessories Quantity: 5 Last updated ago

*/} {/* Mug Description: Mug to drink your hot tea or coffee. Price: £7.00 Cateory: Accessories Quantity: 20 Last updated ago

*/} {/* */} {/* Bottle Description: Bottle to keep your drink nice and cool! Price: £10.00 Cateory: Accessories Quantity: 10 Last updated ago

Notepad Description: Notepad to keep track of your important notes and secrets shhh Price: £6.00 Cateory: Stationery Quantity: 3 Last updated ago

T-shirt Description: T-shirt to wear and feel awesome whilst representing the Version 1 company. Price: £10.00 Cateory: Accessories Quantity: 3 Last updated ago */} ); } export default Home;
